actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to study the feasibility and desirability of a Boston Harbor National Recreation Area in the Commonwealth of Massachusetts.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to study and formulate recommendations on the feasibility and desirability of a Boston Harbor Recreation Area in Massachusetts. Requires the submission of a written report within two years on the scenic, historic, recreational, natural and other values and potential of the area. Authorizes appropriations up to $300,000 to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to study the feasibility and desirability of a Boston Harbor National Recreation Area in the Commonwealth of Massachusetts.
